title: Side effects of high dose Vitamin D
author: Rhodri
description: I have established from research on the internet that taking 40,000 IU vitamin D pills per week for ten weeks has various possible side...
cleaned_text: Posted , 2 users are following. I have established from research on the internet that taking 40,000 IU vitamin D pills per week for ten weeks has various possible side effects such a poor digestion tiredness and aching limbs. . I am now in my forth week and wonder when these side effects will wear off. 0 likes, 14 replies
